code: import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useEffect}from'react';import{fetchProductById}from'../../../store/productsSlice';import styles from'./ProductItemPage.module.scss';import TabPanel from'./tabPanel/TabPanel';import{addToCart}from'../../../store/cartSlice';import BtnFavorites from'../../../pages/favoritesPage/btnFavorites/BtnFavorites';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductItemPage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const dispatch=useDispatch();const product=useSelector(state=>state.products.selected.item);const status=useSelector(state=>state.products.selected.status);const error=useSelector(state=>state.products.selected.error);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchProductById(id));},[dispatch,id]);if(status==='loading')return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});if(status==='error')return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]});if(status==='failed')return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Error..."});if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Product not found or loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.productItemPage,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.containerLeft,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:5050".concat(product.image),alt:product.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.containerRight,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:styles.id,children:["#100",product.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.productTitle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.order,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BtnFavorites,{product:product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(addToCart(product)),className:styles.btnOrder,children:"Order Now"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TabPanel,{product:product})]})]});};export default ProductItemPage;
